welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tokoroa, a charming city known for its beautiful scenic views and friendly locals. Take some time to explore and immerse yourself in our unique culture and enjoy all that Tokoroa has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tokoroa Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tokoroa Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network to stay connected during their travels.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotorua Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Rotorua Airport serves smaller regional airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
